name: Elephant journey
description:
The Space Zoological Station urgently needs an African elephant.

For this mission, two friends with rich experiences of kidnapping are taken from the earth. But to arise, the elephant does not fit in a space plate, but it is better to grab not powerful enough to drag an elephant. To overcome the path of complete obstacle and deliver the elephant, they need to create a powerful enough ship, for this they begin to steal elephants. All elephants, kidnapped, but could not deliver safely back to earth in an energy bubble with the help of terrestrial gravity
